34970.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The door is locked up tight

34971.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「かつて この館は\:
This mansion used to be a villa for the King of Megistris and his family.
The late queen was from Orphea, you see. She had a mysterious power, but... It caused her death at a very young age.
She died leaving behind the still young prince. It is a very sad thing, isn't it?

34972.扉は かたく 閉ざされている。: The door is locked up tight

34973.「おぬしら ２階で何やっとったんじゃ？\n なんだか 館が不思議な光に包まれたよ:
What were y'all doing upstairs? I had a strange feeling that the mansion was enveloped in a mysterious light, but...
Hmm? Ya say ya haveta go see Prince Raguas at Megistris Castle? I don't know what's going on, but hurry on then.
